name: 英語戲劇表演藝術（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大二大三大四修習
goals: To introduce students to fundamental approaches to acting and theater performance in English.
To provide a hands-on environment for students to gain experience in performing theatrical scripts English.

To provide intensive, often one-on-one, guided practice and coaching in oral English as it applies to stage performance; including practice in pronunciation, enunciation, intonation, rhythm, and vocal projection.
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for sophomore, junior, senior
